ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: Whaaa whaaa whaaa. wtf was this about? The dinosaur post? Lol. Someone must have been getting what he wanted by whining during his 12 year ol life. I know it
ygData.messageBody:
Whaaa whaaa whaaa.

wtf was this about? The dinosaur post? Lol.

Someone must have been getting what he wanted by whining during his 12 year
'ol life.

I know it was these kinda posts that TC ment, but he/she seems to need them
so he can learn that whining gets you no where. And quiting brings you
backwards.

sad sad.

-----Original Message-----
From: Thunder Cat [mailto:Thunder_Cat_4283@...]
Sent: den 13 mars 2003 18:39
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Goodbye


I am posting to tell Su that this is AGAIN my last post. I left this group
once before because of idiotic members who insisted on forcing their
opinions apon others, and I will not put up with it. I have better things to

do with my time then spend it with opinionated low lifes. Su, I'm sorry for
everything, none of this goes to you, I know you tired, but there are just
too many morons to filter out of the group. To the rest of you, you will
never get anywhere in life with the attitudes you have. Only in a fantasy
game like EverQuest will you ever be something. But at some point you need
to grow up and face reality, and it's not going to be fun or easy when you
do. Do not bother replying to this post. Leave your fights and comments out
of Su's group and for once in your life respect her wishes and be
CONSIDERATE. If you forgot what that word means, get a dictionary. If you
MUST comment, e-mail me personally, but I most likely will just delete the
message. Like I said, I have better things to do. Good day.

-= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-
